TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MaskGenerationMethod extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示所有掩码生成器算法均必须从中派生的抽象类。

span.span: Represents the abstract class from which all mask generator algorithms must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类的计算在密钥交换算法如最优非对称加密填充 (OAEP) 中使用的掩码。Derived classes of compute masks that are used in key exchange algorithms such as Optimal Asymmetric Encryption Padding (OAEP). 此类是仅用于掩码生成使用密钥交换算法的实现。This class is used by implementations of key exchange algorithms only for mask generation. 应用程序代码不直接使用此类。Application code does not use this class directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类。The following code example demonstrates how to derive from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.MaskGenerationMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.MaskGenerationMethod/CPP/maskgenerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.MaskGenerationMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.MaskGenerationMethod/CS/maskgenerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.MaskGenerationMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.MaskGenerationMethod/VB/maskgenerator.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract byte[] GenerateMask (byte[] rgbSeed, int cbReturn);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance unsigned int8[] GenerateMask(unsigned int8[] rgbSeed, int32 cbReturn) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GenerateMask (rgbSeed As Byte(), cbReturn As Integer) As Byte()
public: abstract cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GenerateMask(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbSeed, int cbReturn);

param.name: rgbSeed
param.span: 用于计算掩码的随机种子。

span.span: The random seed to use to compute the mask.

param.name: cbReturn
param.span: 生成的掩码长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The length of the generated mask in bytes.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定的随机种子生成将具有指定长度的掩码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a mask with the specified length using the specified random seed.

returns.span: 长度等于 参数的随机生成的掩码。

span.span: A randomly generated mask whose length is equal to the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写创建并返回使用指定的种子的掩码。The following code example demonstrates how to override the to create and return a mask using the specified seed. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
